description:
Meet your new foul weather friends. These rain boots combine the full-on waterproofness of a rubber boot with the comfort and support of a sneaker. Kamik's lightweight rubber protects you from the elements without weighing you down, while the contoured footbed provides all-day comfort.

  • 100% waterproof
  • Lightweight, proprietary rubber is 100% recyclable
  • Contoured EVA footbed
  • Antibacterial insole is topped with moisture-wicking mesh
  • Grippy rubber outsole
  • Vegan-Friendly, made without the use of animal products
name: Kamik Miranda Rain Boots - Women's
